body_html:
@edwin100394 no GPU support on windows using bazel yet.
We are still working on it.

On Mon, Nov 7, 2016 at 9:33 PM, edwin100394 notifications@github.com
wrote:

Can I build with GPU support using bazel?

—

body:

We are still working on it.
